name: Simple Student Dashboard
description: Introducing a simple Student Dashboard Notion template for students, designed to help you stay organized and on top of your studies. With this template, you can easily keep track of your classes, assignments, tasks, and notes all in one place. This template has 4 main pages:The Home page of the template allows you to keep track of your schedule and course materials.
